mapper.select:
SELECT eua.sys_id, eua.submit_time, eua.suggestions, eua.submit_by FROM entity_purchse_main epm LEFT JOIN user_entity_mapping uem ON uem.entity_id = epm.entity_no LEFT JOIN exam_user_healthy_appraisal eua ON eua.user_id = uem.user_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND epm.cates = 2 AND epm.is_active = 1 AND epm.is_terminated = 0 AND eua.is_submitted = 1
AND uem.user_id = #{params.userId}
AND DATE_FORMAT(eua.submit_time , '%Y') = DATE_FORMAT(#{params.startDate} , '%Y')
AND DATE_FORMAT(eua.submit_time , '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(#{params.startDate} , '%Y-%m')
ORDER BY eua.submit_time ASC
mapper.sql: sys_id, order_no, user_id, risk_cate, existed_issue, remarks, suggestions, is_submitted, submit_time, submit_by
